name: JumpToSurvive2
description:
Simple in Rules, but difficult in Gameplay mini-game. Made by 1 person, original idea. I would like your opinions

Tutorial:  

controls:  AD Space / Arrows  | You can do a wall jump

Objective: Survive as long as possible, get the highest score possible

mechanics: spikes kill, life drops, Green orbs heal, Yellow and Blue are powerups, they are fired under Q (Yellow) and E (Blue)

No levels or tutorial yet
